0.title: Furniture Gallery
0.description: An ecommerce website made using ReactJS to deliver a robust, scalable, and visually appealing platform for online shoe shopping.

1.title: CryptoTree DAPP
1.description: A crowdfunding decentralized app made using React JS is a platform built on Sepolia blockchain technology that helps collect funds for the plantation of trees and stoping deforestation.

2.title: Sandesha DAPP
2.description: This is a blockchain based text messaging app built with React JS, Web3JS, MetamaskAPI, Truffle It allows users to send messages with complete privacy.

3.title: D-Storage DAPP
3.description: IPFS based decentralized storage application made using ReactJS that provides a secure and reliable way to store multimedia files such as images.
